title: Startup Operations Manager – SOPs, Automation, Systems Thinking (RPA Awareness a Bonus)
job_overview:
We're a growing SaaS startup looking for an experienced Operations Manager / Project Lead to help us streamline internal processes, document SOPs, and manage automations across the business.

We’re not looking for a corporate-style operator — we want someone who:

- Can spot inefficiencies and build clean, scalable systems
- Knows how to document SOPs clearly and practically
- Can collaborate with automation specialists
- Is tech-savvy and understands the moving parts of a modern online business (SaaS, CRMs, email infra, Google Workspace, DNS, etc.)

What you'll be doing:
- Mapping out and documenting our internal workflows (project mgmt, onboarding, support, delivery, etc.)
- Creating SOPs and systems that scale with minimal bottlenecks
- Delegating or coordinating with RPA developers, no-code builders, or software engineers to automate repeatable tasks
- Overseeing technical setup like email platforms, Google Workspace users, domains, etc.
- Working directly with the founder to build out operational foundations

Ideal experience:
- Startup or agency experience
- Project management + operations background
- Familiar with Google Workspace
- Understanding of automation/RPA concepts (you don’t need to code it yourself — just understand it and manage the devs)

Please drop relevant experience - thanks!
